Allow: /
Disallow: /logowanie

Disallow: /api/

# Allow search engines to index main content
Allow: /wyszukiwarka
Allow: /losuj
Allow: /ranking
Allow: /dowcip/
Allow: /kategoria/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://jokebox.pl/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional, be nice to our server)
Crawl-delay: 1
